medium: Soft-paste porcelain, painted gold rim on exterior

makers.displaymaker: Jersey Porcelain and Earthenware Co., American, Jersey City, ca. 1825–1828

texts.textentryhtml: Mary Hollister Prime (née Trumbull) (1827-1872) and William Cowper Prime, Class of 1843 (1825-1905); 1890 gift to Princeton University Art Museum.
texts.remarks: Batch edit for Provenance publication project
